reporting-org.narrative: European Commission - DG Neighbourhood and Enlargement Negotiations

title.narrative: Empowering socially excluded young women in the oPt to become economically active and advocate for their rights with local decision makers

description.narrative: Overall Objective: Increased capacity amongst rural disadvantaged young women to influence local decision making; A reduction in the levels of unemployment and social exclusion experienced by young women.Specific Objective: To enable 18 community based organisations in 6 villages in the Jordan Valley and Ramallah District to effectively support 1450 disadvantaged young women and 50 disadvantaged young men to improve their economic and social status and advance their ability to particip

description.narrative: West Bank : Jordan Valley (Villages of Jeftlek, Fasayel, and Nuweimeh) and Ramallah District (Villages of Tireh, Aboud and Saffa).

description.narrative: Reported results indicators by the European Commission ¿ International Cooperation and Development (DEVCO) may not represent the complete set of indicators monitored for the project. The results are reported using a contribution approach. This means that where a project has been financed by the EU jointly with other funders ¿ such as partner country governments or other donors ¿ the overall outputs of the collective effort are reported rather than outputs attributed to the share of funding provided by the EU. For higher levels of results, such as outcomes and impacts, the project will only have contributed to the overall effort.
